data.actual_result: The chat box won't unlock unless you switch to another channel or server and then come back
data.expected_result: As soon as you get past the 10 minutes verification, the chat box will immediately unlock and you will be able to talk
data.short_description: When you join a server with 10 minutes membership verification enabled and stay on the same channel until the 10 minutes have passed, the chat box won't unlock automatically
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a server which requires to be a member for 10 minutes before talking - Keep the server open and wait until the 10 minutes have passed.
